title: 1952 ticket font ID
content:
Can anyone ID the two fonts used in the bold words  
'GAVILAN /DYKES' and 'MIAMI STADIUM' please?

Thanks

Steve

P.S. honestly don't know if I should have posted these two IDs in two different posts despite them coming from the same ticket. Apologies if I should have...please advise me as to the protocol for future posting. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045429/http:/typophile.com/files/image_45.jpg) | 55.21 KB |
author: Kilgore Trout 23

comments.content:
First ideas that popped out...  
GAVILAN/DYKES: [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045429/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic)  
MIAMI STADIUM: [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024045429/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura)
